item.description:
PRESCOTT PARK ARTS FESTIVAL presents

Hot Club of Cowtown

HOT CLUB OF COWTOWN - August 1, 2012

Back by popular demand! Be prepared to be blown away. Picked by such artists as Bob Dylan and Willie Nelson to tour the globe, this Austin-based band has grown to become one of the hardest-swinging Western swing trios on the planet. With a repertoire based on a fusion of vintage jazz and the Grand Ole Opry, you'll hear not only the influences of Django Reinhardt and Stephane Grappelli, but those of western idols Bob Wills and Hank Williams among many others. The Globe & Mail says their fiddler would be charged with arson "if rosin was flammable". Catch this act!

I SAW THIS BAND LAST YEAR AND WAS QUITE LITERALLY BLOWN AWAY. Don't miss this one!  -Lp

-These concerts are very well attended. Arrive as early as possible.

-Bring a chair or blanket - and picnic food if you wish.

- Meet at 6pm.  Music starts at 7pm.  It might be difficult to find us if you arrive after the music begins...

THERE IS A SUGGESTED DONATION AT THE DOOR.

CLICK HERE FOR WEATHER UPDATES

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.how_to_find_us: House Left - Near the water - Call me to meet
item.name: Prescott Park Arts Festival: Hot Club of Cowtown
